page.title: 02A day in the life of....
page.content: On a Monday morning I get up at 8.00 I go downstairs and my mum gives me my breakfast.For my breakfast I usally have Rice Crispies.I get my bag ready and go to school. I leave for school at 8.30am.My dad takes my brother to school by van but I have to walk.We start the school with an assembly then we go to our classroom and have our lessons.At 10.40 we have playtime, I usally play had at playtime but sometimes we just go around annoying the boys by trying to put them off, their game of football.We have dinner at 12.00and we have last play at 2.30. We go home at 3.45.When I get home I sit down and watch television for about quarter of a hour.Then I go out to play in the alley with Charlotte Towell.We play in the alley for about 1 and a quarter hours and then go to bed. By Clare Howcroft
